pv_calculator.description: general time-based approach to calculate FET losses in power electronis made of multiple half-bridges in short calculation time

fet_engergy_loss_data.description: file containing the FET loss parameters. Formatting: HSN (N is the FET number), LSN, UdcVec, IphVec, TjVec, MatrixSetup, numP, deadTime, Udon, name, log
fet_engergy_loss_data.name: 04_Input/01_FET_data/

load_cycle_data.description: file containing the operating points for a define load cycle. Formatting: time, iPhRMS, uPhRMS, phi, uDC, fel, fPWM, name, log
load_cycle_data.name: 04_Input/02_Load_cycle_data/

temperature_feedback.description: file containing the temperature feedback data. Available only when T feedback is active
temperature_feedback.name: T_junction_feedback.csv

dp_parameters.description: file with information regarding the current design point being calculated. File is created by this module. Information added: nameFET, commutationtype, nameLC
dp_parameters.name: DP_PARAMETERS.csv

fet_losses_time_series.description: file containing the FET losses for each FET at each time step
fet_losses_time_series.name: Pv.csv
